data.text: @PattyMurray Immediate regime change in Iran is needed to end the terrorist Islamic regime, under the leadership of #RezaPahlaviForIran #FreeIran #IranRevolution2026  #IranMassacare @realdonaldtrump @potus

@PattyMurray When the Islamic regime attacks the United States and Israel with nuclear missiles, remember the people of Iran who cried out that this murderous regime must be destroyed. Do not bargain with the devil — eliminate it...#IranMassacre #IranRevoIution2026

@PattyMurray It’s not just about the nuclear deal. If you want the regime gone for good, human rights and Iranian freedom must be conditions. We want to help end this crime against humanity.#KingRezaPahlavi
@PattyMurray Does nuclear negotiation help people of Iran who are being killed by Islamic Regime? They want to be free and don’t need negotiation.

@PattyMurray We, the people of Iran, say over 40,000 of our people have been killed by the regime. We do not want negotiations with this regime. We respectfully ask the world: please don’t focus only on nuclear issues. Stand with the Iranian people and support our basic freedoms.
